name: NexUS//ESC
description:
Listen up, operator. You only have one job left– get out of that high-tech facility alive, and do it quietly. It won’t be easy to do alone, but you’ll have assistance from a hacker on your radio. The security is tight, so you’ll need to communicate and work together if you want to learn to sneak past the guards and crack their security systems.

NexUS//ESC is a two player co-op experience where both player need to navigate the levels and solve the puzzles through communication. You will have to evade the guards and make your escape to win the game.
